MINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS:

    OS: Windows Vista SP2 32-bit
    DirectX: DirectX 10
    Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Equivalent
    Memory: 3 GB
    Hard Drive: 18 GB
    Graphics card (AMD): 512 MB RAM ATI Radeon 4870 or higher performance
    Graphics card (NVIDIA): 512 MB RAM NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or higher performance
    Sound card: DirectX Compatible
    Keyboard or Gamepad or Steering Wheel
    DVD Rom Drive
    Online: 512 KBPS or faster Internet connection

Nevermind my previous comment. I could install the game the third time. What I had to do was keep the installer and the game directory to install into on the same hard drive. Earlier I'd tried with installer on USB drive. The second time the installer was on other partition of the HDD.
Finally, it has all worked out. The game is a little tough though...
probably a lot of people will miss the step "press soft and components button-select English language" (I just did). Normally you just choose the location on your hard drive and hit install. xD
